headline: Corning Meta Fiber Pact Links AI Growth To Rich GLW Valuation
summary: Corning (NYSE:GLW) has entered a long term fiber optic supply agreement with Meta valued at US$6 billion. The deal focuses on providing fiber solutions for the AI powered data center infrastructure used by Meta. The agreement expands Corning's role in supplying critical components to large scale cloud and AI platforms. Corning is best known for glass and advanced materials, but its optical communications segment is a core part of how it serves cloud and connectivity customers. This new...
